faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About CopyWeb
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at support@copyweb.net

items.question: What is CopyWeb and how does it work?
items.answer: CopyWeb is an AI-powered code generator that converts website designs into clean, production-ready code. You can input a URL, upload a screenshot, import from Figma, or describe your design in text, and CopyWeb will generate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code instantly.

items.question: Is CopyWeb really free?
items.answer: Yes! CopyWeb is 100% free forever. There are no hidden costs, no credit system, and no signup required. You can generate unlimited code at zero cost.

items.question: What frameworks does CopyWeb support?
items.answer: CopyWeb supports multiple output formats including React, Vue, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and vanilla HTML/CSS. You can choose your preferred framework before generating code.

items.question: How accurate is the generated code?
items.answer: CopyWeb uses advanced AI to analyze designs and generate highly accurate, pixel-perfect code. The output is responsive, semantic, and follows modern web development best practices.

items.question: Can I use the generated code commercially?
items.answer: Absolutely! All code generated by CopyWeb is yours to use however you like - personal projects, client work, or commercial applications. No attribution required.

items.question: Do I need to create an account?
items.answer: No signup is required for basic usage. You can start generating code immediately. Creating an account unlocks additional features like saving projects and history.

cta.title: Turn Any Website Design Into Code
cta.description: Start generating production-ready code in seconds. 100% free, forever.
